body: Recently, I hit 3000+ mons so I thought I would do a AMA. Go ahead ;p
body_tagged: Recently, I hit 3000+ mons so I thought I would do a AMA. Go ahead ;p
title: Ask Me Anything ;D

replies.body:
Do you like Trump?
If no, who do you want to win the election?
If yes, I AGREE.
replies.body_tagged:
Do you like Trump?
If no, who do you want to win the election?
If yes, I AGREE.

replies.body:
Hi
What is your real name?
Where do you live?
Favourite food?
Favourite drink?
Favourite fruit?
Favourite animal?
Favourite colour?
Favourite Avicus map?
How did you find Avicus?
Chocolate filled donut or donut filled chocolate?
Opinions on me?

replies.body:
How did you find this server?
If you could be in any avicus team, what team would you be in? 

Grats on 3k mons brudda and yea... =D
replies.body_tagged:
How did you find this server?
If you could be in any avicus team, what team would you be in? 

Grats on 3k mons brudda and yea... =D

replies.body:
@Rubik: Not a fan of Trump, and tbh I really don't know who should win the election. :p

@Blaze: Marcus, I live in London, favourite food is pasta/lasagne, favourite drink is apple juice, favourite food is grapefruit, favourite animal are cats, favourite colour is yellow, favourite Avicus map is Senex 1 and Quintus, My friend introuduced me to Avicus back in 2014 around June and since then it's been an awesome server which I enjoy playing, definitely a chocolate filled doughnut and Blaze, your a guy who I should talk to more often. You are a very good avicus player and its great to have ya here in the community.

@Borrah: Again, another awesome guy to have around here, and a great player, we've done awesome rushes in the past and they always worked :p
I like to rush because it's simply fun and it provides me with a challenge, and it's just something I enjoy doing. :p

@MeMyselfAndRyan: As said, a friend told me about the server back in June 2014 and that was the start of my Avicus journey. :p
Cronus - Just simply because I've with them for so long; and thanks Ryan. ;)

@Crimson_Aught: H.Heune
